title: Basic Computer Skills
overview: Basic Computer Skills introduces learners to essential computer literacy and digital skills. This course covers everything from understanding hardware components to navigating modern operating systems, using productivity software, internet browsing, and basic troubleshooting. Learners will become confident in using computers for personal, educational, and professional tasks.
courseDetails: In this course, you will learn the foundational skills needed to operate a computer efficiently. Youâ€™ll explore how to use the Windows or macOS operating systems, understand file management, use common software applications like word processors and spreadsheets, and navigate the internet safely. Whether for work or personal use, this course will equip you with essential computer skills.
certification: Upon completing this course, you will receive a certificate, qualifying you as proficient in basic computer skills.
